title: Summer courses credits
content: After we complete the summer courses, when will the credits be added/ when will it be an addition to the cgpa? ( Currently in 2nd year).

comments.body: I didn't personally take any, but a few of my friends did. Back then it was added to the upcoming semester's credits. So if you're currently finishing/finished 4th semester and take up a summer course, your grade and credits will contribute to the SGPA of the 5th semester. But note that your grade will be visible right after evaluation is done so you'll get the result in the summer itself, but it'll count in the next semester.
All right thank you so much!
